email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the vessel M/V OCEAN HARMONY available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. We are offering a freight rate of $22/MT on a CIF basis. Laycan is 15-20 November. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you do $19/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer $20/MT on a CIF basis. Laytime is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $15,000/day. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the revised offer. We can proceed with $20/MT. Please send the recap for the shipment.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Iron Ore
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Tubarão
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Freight Rate: $20/MT CIF
- Laycan: 15-20 November
- Laytime: 72 hours
- Demurrage: $15,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The recap looks good. Please proceed with the arrangements.

Best regards,
John
